VoiceSettings.name: VoiceSettings
VoiceSettings.label: Voice Settings
VoiceSettings.description: Represents VoiceSettings metadata component used in Salesforce deployments and package development.

FullName.description: The unique identifier for this metadata component

enableCallDisposition.description: enable Call Disposition field of VoiceSettings metadata component.

enableVoiceCallList.description: enable Voice Call List field of VoiceSettings metadata component.

enableVoiceCallRecording.description: enable Voice Call Recording field of VoiceSettings metadata component.

enableVoiceCoaching.description: enable Voice Coaching field of VoiceSettings metadata component.

enableVoiceConferencing.description: enable Voice Conferencing field of VoiceSettings metadata component.

enableVoiceLocalPresence.description: enable Voice Local Presence field of VoiceSettings metadata component.

enableVoiceMail.description: enable Voice Mail field of VoiceSettings metadata component.

enableVoiceMailDrop.description: enable Voice Mail Drop field of VoiceSettings metadata component.
